Package levels.rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
levels.rooms.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonRoom, FinalRoom, ShopRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object implements Serializable
This class is common for all types of the rooms in the game.
See Also:

    • assertNearbyRooms

      public void assertNearbyRooms(Room[][] roomMatrix)
      Checks all nearby rooms in the roomMatrix and connects to this room.
      Parameters:
      roomMatrix - matrix of rooms from which nearby rooms will be checked.
